biotools.summary: The PSIPRED Protein Analysis Workbench unites many available analysis tools into a single web based framework. An excellent tool for prediction of secondary structure, with access to GenTHREADER for protein fold recognition and MEMSAT-2 transmembrane topology prediction.

bioschemas.name: PSIPRED
bioschemas.summary: The PSIPRED Protein Analysis Workbench unites many available analysis tools into a single web based framework. An excellent tool for prediction of secondary structure, with access to GenTHREADER for protein fold recognition and MEMSAT-2 transmembrane topology prediction.
